columns.name: name
columns.description: The table name.

columns.name: catalog_id
columns.description: The ID of the Data Catalog in which the table resides.

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: The time when the table definition was created in the data catalog.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the table.

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: The person or entity who created the table.

columns.name: database_name
columns.description: The name of the database where the table metadata resides.

columns.name: is_registered_with_lake_formation
columns.description: Indicates whether the table has been registered with lake formation.

columns.name: last_access_time
columns.description: The last time that the table was accessed. This is usually taken from HDFS, and might not be reliable.

columns.name: last_analyzed_time
columns.description: The last time that column statistics were computed for this table.

columns.name: owner
columns.description: The owner of the table.

columns.name: retention
columns.description: The retention time for this table.

columns.name: table_type
columns.description: The type of this table (EXTERNAL_TABLE, VIRTUAL_VIEW, etc.).

columns.name: update_time
columns.description: The last time that the table was updated.

columns.name: view_expanded_text
columns.description: If the table is a view, the expanded text of the view otherwise null.

columns.name: view_original_text
columns.description: If the table is a view, the original text of the view otherwise null.

columns.name: parameters
columns.description: These key-value pairs define properties associated with the table.

columns.name: partition_keys
columns.description: A list of columns by which the table is partitioned.

columns.name: storage_descriptor
columns.description: A storage descriptor containing information about the physical storage of this table.

columns.name: target_table
columns.description: A TableIdentifier structure that describes a target table for resource linking.

columns.name: lf_tags
columns.description: LF-Tags assigned to the table by AWS Lake Formation.
